abstract: Polk County, Florida, deputy fatally shoots Dominic Fuller while investigating call about suspected drug activity; Fuller had run from scene and hidden and was shot by deputy when he emerged pointing black object at police, which later turned out to be stapler.
lead_paragraph: A Central Florida deputy shot a man to death during a standoff after the authorities said the man pointed a stapler at the deputy.

headline.main: Florida: Brandishing a Stapler, a Man Is Killed by a Deputy
headline.print_headline: Florida: Brandishing a Stapler, a Man Is Killed by a Deputy

snippet: A Central Florida deputy shot a man to death during a standoff after the authorities said the man pointed a stapler at the deputy.
